text:
Yo Zuzu!
You are definitely the most chill person I have known. I don't know how I would have survived the eco department without you. Can't thank you enough for all the econometrics assignment you did xDDDD, for making all the wonderful notes. Vaise I seriously dont remember the first year vala incident when I asked you about your relationship lol :p Last month I am glad we did a lot of fun together especially the graffiti üòè. And ofcourse, ye to sbne likh hi diya hai ....hatsoff to your chipkali bhagane ki skills! All the very best for the new chapter of your life and love you <3
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
Yo influencer! 
Writing these memoirs are actually tough lol. There is so much to write, smajh nhi aata ky likhe ky nhi. You were my travel partner always <3. I guess hum sbse jyada baat tb hi krte the and poore sem bhar ki gossip kr lete the. I think we had a conversation for the first time about the weird connection our parents had lol xD. As we have discussed this many times, I am always amazed by the transformation you have had over these four years. From being a shy, innocent, reserved person to becoming an extrovert, bold and a fearless girl you have had your journey. And yes hatsoff to your contacts, mjhe aur pratigya ko to sari cheezein tjhse hi pta chalti thi xD This last month was a lot of fun and I loved this influencer phase of yours :p and I wish I could have spent more time with you guys. All the very best for your upcoming life and tu aur pratigya keep sending me gifts üòå Love you piyu <3 PS: Tripod is going on a trip for sure!
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
After infinite procrastination, here we go! 
Where do I start from smajh nhi aa rha. I guess we first met in 2nd year Ritambhara only. Far from the reality, you, me and deeksha so seriously discussing kise bulaye parineeti chopra, kangana ranaut, preity zinta etc etc lol. I guess we were the most enthusiastic people for Ritambhara. Bhayiiiiiii kitni fun memories hai sath me. Oh god ...remember that tension, interview ke time ritambhara se kata diya to xD I still remember you saying "Tears were rolling down my face, but I was not crying"....that was lit üî•üòÇ And then that prank jo krishna aur maine kiya tha ...I guess thoda jyada ho gya tha bt it was super fun xD I can never forget that incident jb driver bhaiya ne mast gaadi park ki thi and you were like "bakchod bhaiya" aur fir bhaiya offend ho gye the xD and you justifying it with "are bhaiya ye hmare yha gaali nhi hoti :p" And so much more pta nhi ky ky yaad aa rha. Fighting over the oriflame and forrest essentials products, NNM adah sharma aa rhe nhi aa rhe, and then karishma sharma ka last moment pe convert hona. I have to say I am a big fan of your hmesha smiling face. Alag hi positive vibes aati. I love your company and hope to stay connected always. And trip pe chalo jldi!!!!!
#IAMFASHION <3
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
Yo Dost! I don't really remember exactly when we became friends (I just remember we watched a movie together in second yr summers) but I am glad we did. And here we are what we can call as virtual best friends‚úåÔ∏è. You are amazingly weird guy with a lots of cousins and a person who is extremely obsessed with the organization of things (which I love btw) xD. Hope we'll survive rest of the semesters and the placements together as we survived this year. Definitely last yr would have been boring without you. Hope we'll make infinite more memories together in our last yr on campus (if we ever returned :p). Cheers to our friendship ü§ü
PS: Your name is still saved as "giraffe" in my phone xD
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
Yo Deeksha! 
I guess our bond strengthened while 2nd year Ritambhara. Far from the reality, you, me and Ayush so seriously discussing kise bulaye parineeti chopra, kangana ranaut, preity zinta etc etc lol. And then that confusion kha jaaye counselling service, E cell, Ritambhara, tera hss. I can literally remember us discussing it everytime we met in 4th semester xD. And yes can never forget that scary course - Numerical methods. It was always fun whenever we talked. And abhi to poora ek saal baki hai. We are definitely going to make many more memories ek bar bas campus khul jaaye. Love you <3 See you soon!
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text: yeah we met in the hall office for the first time xD and same! you were the first girl I talked to in our batch.
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
Yo Gunjan!
We definitely had a great time during the bady summer camp. I loved the way you led us during the warm up exercises and cool down exercises.....aise nhi aise kro xD. Aise hi sbki GPL lete rehna aur mast khaate peete rehna. I always loved your bindaas attitude. Stay awesome! Hope our paths cross again.
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
Yo sticker boy!
You know we didn't meet for the first time through Ritambhara. As a matter of fact, we have a trip together ...MANALI ! Although I don't think we ever talked on the trip, I just knew you are a friend of jatin. I formed an impression of you as a silent person lol. Little did I know ky bakchod insan hai tu. Obviously Ritambhara could not have been more fun without you , Ayush and Krishna. And especially the meetings with head events xDxD. Kitni gaali khata tha be tu....daya bhi aati thi bt hasi jyada aati thi lol. I'll always miss the way you called ayush "abey bhosdike" :p And then remember that failed attempt of ours to convince every jeweller to give us money xD But I seriously respect your dedication towards UPSC preparation and I am sure you're going to do great in your life! On a serious note, bada aadmi banke bhool mat jana üòú Keep in touch! Baaki hmari ek trip pending h vo plan krte hai asap. 
#IAMFASHION <3
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
Yo Jatin! kya haal chal ?
That Manali trip was so much fun because of you guys. Aise hi haste muskurate rho aur volley me chaapte rho. All the best and keep in touch :)
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text: Yo Jay! Naman ka memoir padke mai already complex me hu xD no one can match that level but I'll try to keep it short and sweet. sbse pehle to I really wish ki tum bhi manali trip pe aate so that hum thoda jldi dost bante. But anyway, better late than never. You are a great friend, always smiling, always cheerful, always helping, always motivating! I have always admired you for your enthusiasm towards doing challenging projects and courses and dedication towards finance. I also admire you for your googling skills xD I am still amazed how you managed to get a dussa in last semester inspite of being clueless for most of the semester lol xD And that topology midsem ...vo tp hmesha yad rhega lol. Here's to hoping you succeed in whatever you wish to do and earn lots of money! And lets work on our fitness :p Lots of Love <3
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text: One of the sweetest girl I have met in our batch! It was always nice talking to you <3
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
JD! JD! JD! 
Ab ky bole hum tumhare baare me. Bade atrangi dost ho tum hmare. I am glad humne summer camp kiya aur hum dost bane. Har cheez me bakchod to ho hi yr tum .... sports acads chess dance! Aise hi chaapte rho. first year me har ladki ki friend list me rehte the tum hehe. And obviously tum bht bade chupirustum ho pta nhi itna sb kaise pach jata hai pet me. bt jo bhi hai hum bht khush hai tumhare liye aur aasha krte hai tumhari sbhi manokaamnaein poori ho üòè. haha mai vo incident kbhi nhi bhulungi jb techkriti me mai bht bhand thi aur tumhe hume sambhalne ki responsibity di thi ...and maine kha mai theek hu akele aur tb bhi tum "jaisa aap kahe" bolke chale gye lol xD. Ummeed hai ki agli bar tum mjhe plot 4 me hara paoge aur hum ummeed krte hai ki agli bar tumhe chess me harane ki koshish krein. dher sara pyar <3
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text: Chemistry labs were definitely fun. Although I formed an impression of you as a very silent person xD. Little did I know tum itne chapu ho hehe. TC!
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
Yo Neha! 
My dual partner! Kaafi courses kr liye is saal sath me. Apni i guess jitni baat hui hai acads related hi hui h. I am glad we became friends. You are really sweet. I am looking forward to making some memories together in our final year! bas campus khule jldi ! See you soon
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
Yo Palak!
We have been constant companions throughout the four years from doing TA together to bearing weird professors of eco department. And yes that manali trip will always be close to my heart.... I literally knew nobody on that trip (ofcourse thoda bht jaante the sbko) but after that trip kaafi acche dost ban gye the apan log. I have always admired your energy for doing so many things .... you were literally everywhere... be it drams, hec, basketball, antaragni, acads, film club, galaxy and what not. And yes film club se yad aaya I still get the horrors of that short film lol xD (kidding). Eco department ka naam to roshan kr hi diya hai üòå I am so proud of you. All the very best for the next chapter of your life. Love you <3
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text: üññüññ
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
Yo Pragya! üññ
If there is a one line description of you its - " chota packet bada dhamaka" ! I still cannot forget that scary post you shared on my birthday xD Always admired your energy and dedication about things. Aise hi chaapte rho! Hope to stay in touch in future.
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
Finally after infinite procrastination here we go !!

Honestly, I cannot imagine these four years without you <3. You were literally 50% of my campus life. Lets start from the very beginning. The day we first met, when swadha and I went for a random walk around the wing and we had a little chit chat. At that time only I was very sure that we are gonna be friends. And then eventually we started talking more and became very good friends very soon. Ofcourse we have infinite memories together. From making your braids, to random strolls, to never ending bulla, to somehow passing PHY103 even after poori raat muggne ke  baad (and ofcourse you were not studying xD), to discussing about our crushes :p, to literally getting up at 5:50 and somehow reaching the PE ground at 6 in the fear that we won't get the refund, to watching shady movies together, to spending that memorable night at faculty building rooftop <3 and .... ahhh not forgetting our beloved SHYAM and uski khtarnaak thookne ki shakti lol. You were always the gamemaster of our group, pta nhi kha kha se nye nye games laati hai (but still nothing matched the level of donkey xD) and its because of you that I can't undo things like "saas bahu aur sensex", "arvind desai ki ajeeb dastan" and pta nhi ky ky from my memory lol. Btw I am still making A se shuru hone vale ladkon ki list (although I believe we can remove the A criteria now :p). I really hope to see your korean shows one day and appreciate them. To be honest, you are a gem of a person. I have literally seen you care so much for your friends. I cannot thank you enough for listening to all my rants. That one hour bulla when I came to your room after the whole day was always so refreshing. All the very best for your upcoming life and tu aur priyal mjhe gifts bhejte rehna üòå and come to campus if situation improves. and han campus tu ghumayegi hume and especially Audi üòà. bhai hmari goa trip ab bhi sapna hi hai ...next time kch nhi sun rhi mai. 

PS: I love you babi <3
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text: A boy who is extraordinarily chapu in everything be it acads or sports and who has an expressionless face :p. I was so happy to find one photo jisme tum smile kr rhe the xDD in the kurta photoshoot. I hope we go to a trip to east sometime ...bas is bar ek hafte ke notice me mat bolna lol. All the best and keep in touch!
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text: The boy with chapu design skills and artistic skills. I still remember you asked me if I can arrange a picture with the judges of ritambhara in first year haha xDD.
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text: Yo Orientation partner, PSY151 partner, ART 106 partner, PE partner (our group was probably the most fraud group xD ). We have had a lot of common things in first year. Hope to stay in touch <3. All the best for the future!
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text: Yo Partner! Phy labs were fun with you!
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text: Hey old friend! I can surely say you were the first good male friend I had in first year xD kitna ghoomte the yr apan log aur kitna baat krte the. It was always fun! I wish maine TEDX me itna fraud nhi mara hota :p, we would have spent more time together. I know hum itni baat nhi krte but you were always special for me. I hope our paths cross again. Stay the amazing person you are! And yes, hats off to your dedication towards E-cell! Aise hi chaapte rho!
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
Throughout the course SOC481 I thought that you were a Y16 :p (idk why ) until you finally corrected me. I am glad I did the course NLP and got to meet you and Abhishek, vo alag baat hai course me kch nhi kiya xD. I hope we'll stay in touch! All the very best for future. 
PS: ye aajkal jo tum digital art kr rhe ho mjhe bhi sikha dena xD
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
Hey old roomie! Thanks for being such an amazing roommate. One thing I'll always be proud of is that our room was one of the cleanest rooms in our batch xD. I'm gonna miss so many things - aunty ke chocolate filled cakes (which I stole everytime :p), your M club posters and my wall painting, all those gossips about random people and random bitching, eagerly waiting for each episode of GOT, our alarms ringing alternatively and we procrastinating getting up for hours and so much more. Thanks for always listening to me - I could literally tell you everything knowing that you will keep it a secret. Thanks for making me try that blueberry yoghurt and for filling the CS form for me and priya :p. One time you wore a one-piece and straightened your hair...that day will always be remembered xD.  
I still remember how you somehow end up getting injured all the time in first year... ped se takra jana, cycle se gir jana, washroom me phone gira dena lol. You are a bunch of talent. I still don't know how many more hidden talents you have .... music painting studies and so much more, chalo at least we can leave dancing :p Wish you all the luck for the new journey you're gonna start. You will always have a special place in my heart. Just remember I am just a phone call away<3. "Keep Smiling" and keep rocking!
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text:
Hiiiiiii Vipullllllll !!! (you know it was going to start this way only )
You are the most crazy and mast dost I have made in campus. Hopeless to tu hai hi, jb dekho tb maze leta rehta hai mere aur JD ke aur tanmay ke bhi. Aur agar koi na bhi hase tere jokes/PJs pe to bhi khud hi haske (picturing your khtarnaak hasi) pooch lega "accha tha na xD" and fir sbko hasi aa jaegi lol. And that trip to lucknow was a lot of fun, cannot forget how much you irritated me that day. I remember escape room se nikalke alag hi style maar rha tha tu xDD jbki kiya kch tha nhi lol. Always stay the 
same crazy person and keep spreading smiles. pichle kch mahinon me I got to know you better as a person, accha laga ...aise hi baat krte rehna. All the very best for the next phase of your life. Love you <3
author: Ritika  Ajmera

text: Still remember you got a haircut in Manali aur har pic se pehle are ruko Yadu ko baal set kr lene do xDD  Hatsoff to your dedication towards Antaragni second year se hi! All the best and keep in touch :)
author: Ritika  Ajmera
